name: Gnome Planner File
summary: Learn about .PLANNER files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Planner is sometimes used as an alternative to Microsoft Project, which creates .MPP files. Planner can import .MPX XML files exported by Microsoft Project.

description: Project file created by Planner, a project management program; can include a Gantt chart, tasks, resources, and resource utilization; used by project managers for saving project plans and tracking progress.
